EmailTemplate.name: Dispute DocuSign
EmailTemplate.subject: Dispute process
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email and for providing that information! This dispute form has been sent to your email address. The access code is the last 4 of your social. Once we have received this back signed, we will begin the dispute process.
It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. We appreciate your membership. Have a wonderful day!
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
{!Case.OwnerTitle}
Idaho Central Credit Union
Eastern Idaho 208-478-3300
Treasure Valley 208-846-7000
Magic Valley 208-733-4777
www.iccu.com
Helping members achieve financial success.
